recapArticle.title: Nigeria 1, Bosnia-Herzegovina 0: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group F Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Peter Odemwingie (Nigeria).
Senad Lulic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Peluoluwa Adejugba
timelineItems.text: What is Musa doing in this match in such a strategic position??!! #NGA

timelineItems.name: Fútbol en RTVE
timelineItems.text: #NGAvsBIH Primera amarilla del partido para #BIH,Haris Medunjanin por falta sobre Musa #NGA por un error defensivo. http://t.co/XSfzsqzgqF

timelineItems.name: Fútbol en RTVE

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. John Obi Mikel (Nigeria) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Ogenyi Onazi.

timelineItems.name: THE Sports Freak
timelineItems.text: After a Musa break, #NGA Mikel gets a shot toward #BIH Begovic's net, but its wide of the keepers right-hand post. Bright start, end-to-end.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Nigeria. John Obi Mikel tries a through ball, but Michel Babatunde is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Joe Baker
timelineItems.text: Mikel taking potshots in that No.10 role... So odd.#NGA

timelineItems.name: DJ Midli
timelineItems.text: So far #NGA is just too slow against the speedy #BIH team. They may get a lucky fluke goal on a break tho. #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Ildefonso Araiza Jr.
timelineItems.text: What poor play from #NGA outside the box after a bad give away from #BIH. You have to make most of those chances.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Ogenyi Onazi (Nigeria) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.

timelineItems.name: Dean Rosario
timelineItems.text: #NGA looking fantastic. Complete contrast to unimaginative, stodgy performance in opening game. Reminiscent of the great NGA team of WC1994

timelineItems.name: Ayo #WePlugGoodMusic
timelineItems.text: Allow the long range shots please. We have the momentum, move the ball around some #NGA

timelineItems.name: SN ®
timelineItems.text: #ArenaPantanal cheia para #NGA x #BIH. #CopadasCopas #Copa2014 #NGAvsBIH http://t.co/1fznynyM0R

timelineItems.text: #ArenaPantanal cheia para #NGA x #BIH. #CopadasCopas #Copa2014 #NGAvsBIH http://t.co/1fznynyM0R

timelineItems.name: John McFarlane
timelineItems.text: Best quote of the #WorldCup2014: "70% of earth is covered by water, the other 30% is covered by Muhamed Bešić" #BIH http://t.co/zykxXNKPRX

timelineItems.text: Our boys are playing better cause they are playing more daring opponents... Good ball. #NGA #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Ahmed Musa (Nigeria) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by John Obi Mikel.

timelineItems.name: Kimberly J. Curtis
timelineItems.text: #BIH not finding their rhythm but #NGA not converting their chances into goals. Improvement needed on both sides.

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Nigeria 1, Bosnia and Herzegovina 0.

timelineItems.name: Jeremiah Mateola
timelineItems.text: Nigeria were lucky. The tactics second half were naive. But were pretty much though so well done! #NGA

timelineItems.name: Ollie Davis
timelineItems.text: #BIH have been a disappointment. Always going to be hard after playing #ARG first, but still expected them to progress to the next round.

timelineItems.name: Kevin-Prince Boateng
timelineItems.text: very unlucky night for dzeko it must be said.. #BIH

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Belgium advances to the #WorldCup knockout round for the first time since 2002.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Algeria is the first African team to score four goals in a #WorldCup game.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: #USMNT-Portugal pregame now on ESPN. First meeting since a U.S. 3-2 win at the 2002 #WorldCup.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage plan: NED-CHI: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN AUS-ESP: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN2 CRO-MEX: 3:30 ET, ESPN CMR-BRA: 3:30 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: #USMNT has conceded seven goals in the first five minutes of #WorldCup games, most by any team in WC history.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: David Villa extends his Spanish records with his 59th int'l goal and his 9th #WorldCup goal.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Varela's goal (90'+4:33) is the latest recorded #WorldCup goal in a regulation game.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Neymar puts Brazil up 1-0 with the 100th goal of this #WorldCup.

timelineItems.name: Andy Davies!
timelineItems.text: Ahmed Musa taking a very ambitious shot from outside the box, Asmir Begović will catch them all day long! #NGA #BIH #NGAvsBIH

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Bosnia and Herzegovina. Zvjezdan Misimovic tries a through ball, but Edin Dzeko is caught offside.
Foul by Ahmed Musa (Nigeria).
Mensur Mujdza (Bosnia and Herzegovina) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Andrew French
timelineItems.text: I thought that was onside live.. Hmm, poor decision? #NGABIH

timelineItems.name: A Filthy Rodent
timelineItems.text: #BIH are passing almost as badly as #ENG have been in the early stages of their games.

timelineItems.name: Seth Vertelney
timelineItems.text: Haven't had an officiating controversy in a few days, but Dzeko was just ruled offside on a perfectly good goal #BIH

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Izet Hajrovic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Miralem Pjanic.
Attempt saved. Edin Dzeko (Bosnia and Herzegovina) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Haris Medunjanin with a through ball.
Corner,  Bosnia and Herzegovina. Conceded by Vincent Enyeama.

timelineItems.name: Anthony Dinan
timelineItems.text: Another cracking game #NGA #BIH

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Ogenyi Onazi (Nigeria) right footed shot from the right side of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Emmanuel Emenike.

timelineItems.name: Jackson marshalls
timelineItems.text: What I don't get is why are #NGA players crossing the ⚽️ in the air. They are not superior in that aspect.

timelineItems.name: Hoskins
timelineItems.text: Pulling for #BIH after that stolen goal. #BIHvsNGA

timelineItems.name: Rich
timelineItems.text: The fastbreaks from #BIH really highlight why it's good to have more than two midfielders willing to track back defensively.

timelineItems.text: Bright this by Bosnia, shame the goal was wrongly ruled out #BiH

timelineItems.name: nissssa
timelineItems.text: Bosnia deserves to win this time. They're starting off good ��⚽️ #BiH

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Ogenyi Onazi (Nigeria) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Argentina_Futbol
timelineItems.text: I can understand why #BIH feel hard done with conceding dat goal, as they dem self scored a goal 1st but was called offside..

timelineItems.name: JFT96
timelineItems.text: Have to question Lulic's positioning for that goal. Kolasinac wouldn't have been caught like that. Lulic unimpressive in both games. #BIH

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Peter Odemwingie (Nigeria) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Emmanuel Emenike.

timelineItems.name: Austin Nkem
timelineItems.text: #BIH players complaining of foul prior to #NGA goal. Thought it was a foul against Emenike. In any case great goal from Peter Odemwingie

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Edin Dzeko (Bosnia and Herzegovina) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Haris Medunjanin with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Marvin Sissey
timelineItems.text: Dzeko too dangerous with any touch of the game ...he needs to be contained . #Nga vs #Bnia

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Emmanuel Emenike (Nigeria) because of an injury.

timelineItems.text: That kind of ball right there is why Emenike can't get into a top European league. #NGA

timelineItems.name: Kenny Price
timelineItems.text: So many skin tight kits in this tournament. Cept for Bosnia. They all look two sizes too big. #NGAvBIH

timelineItems.text: Así festejó #NGA el gol que los tiene al frente en el marcador. http://t.co/Qji0GDStEx http://t.co/lXCGLjkFH4

timelineItems.name: Panos Kelamis
timelineItems.text: #NGA have clearly identified the right of #BIH to be the weak spot, especially the captain Spahic, horrible game so far for him

timelineItems.name: Deji
timelineItems.text: Onazi has provided a lot of energy in midfield. he gets the ball up the pitch in a hurry. #NGA

timelineItems.name: Lewis Dean
timelineItems.text: #NGA look a completely different team to the one against Iran - pace, power, purpose and drive. good to watch!

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Edin Dzeko (Bosnia and Herzegovina) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Miralem Pjanic.

timelineItems.name: Jason McMorrow
timelineItems.text: Pleased to see the referee allowing a good deal of physicality in this game without blowing the whistle, it's what football needs. #NGABIH

timelineItems.name: Joseph Osemwengie Asemota
timelineItems.text: Get hype #Nigeria #NGA #Naija #FIFA #futbol #soccer #WorldCup #FIFAWorldCup

timelineItems.text: If our boys continue like this Bosnia will equalize and win this match ooo #NGA

timelineItems.text: Grim faces at the moment here. But we are not giving up! Hajmo, #BIH!!! Hajmo, #Zmajevi!!!!

timelineItems.name: ‎​‎ ‎​ ‎​
timelineItems.text: Ok I'm sure he does it on purpose now RT @Squawka: Vincent Enyeama. Just chilling. #NGA http://t.co/tBSGUyvnHC

timelineItems.name: Zach
timelineItems.text: #BIH I think there are a lot of us that think you have it in you to make a comeback and take the game. After those calls, I'm cheering you.

timelineItems.name: ‎​‎ ‎​ ‎​

timelineItems.text: #NGA have played well. Pressed well and adopted a very high tempo approach as usual.

timelineItems.name: Smooth Deep
timelineItems.text: Bosnia need to fix the holes at that back from the first half not gonna call anyone out if you've been watching you know. Hajmo Bosno! #BiH

timelineItems.text: Mikel needs to get into this game and help Onazi tidy up the midfield, too much room for the Bosnian #NGA 1 #BIH 0 #FansConnect

timelineItems.name: Keith Hickey
timelineItems.text: My favorite thing about #BIH is how many of these dudes are willing to piss away the sensible pass and just go for the fun ball.

timelineItems.name: Danny Rinehart
timelineItems.text: #BIH needs to bring in Ibišević and go with two strikers up top with him and Džeko. They gotta be aggressive going after the equalizer.

timelineItems.name: Vasco Mota Pereira
timelineItems.text: Absolutely no pressure from #BIH midfield when defending. #NIG allowed to take their time and pick their passes. #Troubling

timelineItems.name: Qlder
timelineItems.text: Don't know what Bosnia is doing but they can't get out of their own third. Nigeria making the better chances this half. #NGABIH #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Olatoye Osunsanya Jr
timelineItems.text: Emenike giving that right back all sorts of trouble! Now, if only he can finish just as good. #WorldCup2014 #NGABIH

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Ahmed Musa (Nigeria) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: RAMBÖZORLACOTT
timelineItems.text: #NGA breakin out some nice chances. Like their style. Cool and relax until they burst out with pace & strength. can #BIH level it up?

timelineItems.name: Matthew Herbert
timelineItems.text: Bosnia can't contain Odemwingie at the moment, their back line is looking shoddy. Begovic keeping them in the game. #NGA vs #BIH

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Emmanuel Emenike (Nigeria) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Shola Ameobi.
Corner,  Nigeria. Conceded by Asmir Begovic.
Attempt blocked. Vedad Ibisevic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Zvjezdan Misimovic.

timelineItems.name: Alex N
timelineItems.text: So its Ameobi time... On for Musa. I hope this doesn't come back to bite us you know, Musa was excellent today. #NGA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Mensur Mujdza (Bosnia and Herzegovina).
Michel Babatunde (Nigeria) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Peter Odemwingie (Nigeria).
Edin Dzeko (Bosnia and Herzegovina) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Delay in match Michel Babatunde (Nigeria) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Attempt missed. Peter Odemwingie (Nigeria) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.name: Deji
timelineItems.text: 7': Medunjanin takes a professional foul to deny musa a clear path on goal. He sees yellow for that offense. #NGA have a free kick.

timelineItems.name: Bruno
timelineItems.text: #BIH has lost a couple of goal-scoring opportunities by not following up a pass/shot. It's a very low-energy brand of football.

timelineItems.name: Ya Kil
timelineItems.text: #NGA does not deserve to win, they are poor and wasted far too many chances!

timelineItems.name: Thomas Butcher
timelineItems.text: There really is something to European teams in South America, most are looking out of form like #BIH today #WorldCup #NGAvsBIH

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Edin Dzeko (Bosnia and Herzegovina) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Sejad Salihovic with a cross.
Delay in match Michel Babatunde (Nigeria) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: OlaWale
timelineItems.text: Emenike is channeling the "bull" like Amokachi back in the glory days. He may need a "Yekini" to finish for him. Who will that be? #NGA #BIH

timelineItems.name: Soctty123
timelineItems.text: Bosnia looking increasingly unlikely. #BIH #NIG

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Bosnia and Herzegovina. Conceded by Joseph Yobo.

timelineItems.name: Omar Sandouka
timelineItems.text: Got absolutely no idea how Emenike drills his way into the box from the flank #NGA #BIH #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Attempt missed. Vedad Ibisevic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) header from the left side of the six yard box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Zvjezdan Misimovic with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Muslim Gooner
timelineItems.text: What a huge chance that was for Ibesevic #BIH

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Miralem Pjanic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Muhamed Besic.

timelineItems.text: 0 - #NGA haven’t won any of their last nine World Cup games (D3 L6), their last victory was a 1-0 over Bulgaria in 1998. Challenge.

timelineItems.text: #BIH havent been as clinical in midfield this second half.They haven't been able to handle Emenike and have been very poor in front of goal

timelineItems.name: Jeff Polley
timelineItems.text: It would be a shame to see Bosnia go out, particularly as they were denied a goal by an asst ref error. A draw would be fair. #NGABIH

timelineItems.comment: Shola Ameobi (Nigeria) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Toni Sunjic (Bosnia and Herzegovina).

timelineItems.name: World Soccer Talk
timelineItems.text: Less than 15 minutes remaining in this match. #NGA clinging to their one goal lead like a lifeline. #BIH doing their best to equalize. '77.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Hague
timelineItems.text: I suppose it's too much to hope for that #NIG v #BIH is as good as the game earlier this evening?

timelineItems.name: Sean Murphy
timelineItems.text: As always, I'll be screaming my lungs out for #NGA, but on the inside I'm worried this won't end well.

timelineItems.name: Almin Sabotic
timelineItems.text: Pride of sandzak is not starting for Bosnia? Well guess I will stay at the pool...good luck with decision. #bih

timelineItems.name: BlueMoonNews™
timelineItems.text: Everyone watching Edin Džeko for #BIH tonight lets hope he gets a few goals all city players team have been awful so far apart from #FRA

timelineItems.text: Saturday #WorldCup prediction: #BIH 3v1 #NGA Up to #NGA to up their game and try to survive in this group, #BIH played well against #ARG.

timelineItems.name: Football Coach
timelineItems.text: great start to the #BIH #NGA game. High pressure from #NGA causing #BIH defenders all sorts of problems. Looks like goals in this game.

timelineItems.name: Saim Ashraf
timelineItems.text: This is SO bad from #BIH tactically. Two tall strikers and no width whatsoever.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Muhamed Besic (Bosnia and Herzegovina).
Juwon Oshaniwa (Nigeria) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: el mo
timelineItems.text: the Bosnian goalkeeper will need to go soak his gloved hands in water after this game #NGA #FIFA2014

timelineItems.text: Into the last 10 minutes, will we see another goal in this match? #NGA #BIH

timelineItems.text: Nigeria getting too passive for my liking..#NGABIH #WorldCup2014Brazil

timelineItems.name: Tefo
timelineItems.text: #NGA are NOT underdogs. They have beat bigger teams than #Bih ever has.

timelineItems.text: I don't think Odemwingie has given the ball away once in this game, 100% pass completion I reckon #NGA

timelineItems.text: You can tell the players are sweating a lot when their white jerseys become see-through #BIH #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Ollie Glanvill
timelineItems.text: Love Omeruo's on pitch leadership, he strolls out of defence and throws his arms up urging his team forward #cfc #nga

timelineItems.name: Neil Ainger
timelineItems.text: Is Pjanic better than the rest of this Bosnian team combined? #WorldCup #NGABIH

timelineItems.text: Besic is a warrior, he's been everywhere for Bosnia, incredible performance! #BIH

timelineItems.text: Pjanic and Begovic have been superb for #BIH. Sadly for them, their team-mates haven't. #NGAvsBIH

timelineItems.text: What a let down from #BIH big anti climax, was hoping for so much more #NGABIH

timelineItems.text: Thought it was coming there for #BIH. Misimovic completely fluffed that. #NGA will more than likely get through after this.

timelineItems.text: @EdDzeko headed a good ball but #NGA goalie was spot on #NGAvsBIH #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: HUNTLEY-SMYTH
timelineItems.text: Bosnia have been cheated out of the World Cup!! #BIH #NGA

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Nigeria ends a 9-game #WorldCup winless streak with its 1st WC win since 1998. Bosnia-Herzegovina is eliminated.

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Nigeria 1, Bosnia and Herzegovina 0.
